verses.verse: Thus says <WH559> Yahweh, <WH3068> "Heaven <WH8064> is my throne, <WH3678> and the earth <WH776> is my footstool: <WH7272> what kind of house <WH1004> will you build <WH1129> to me? <WH4725> and what place shall be my rest? <WH4496>

For all these things has my hand <WH3027> made, <WH6213> and so all these things came to be, <WH5002>" says Yahweh: <WH3068> "but to this man will I look, <WH5027> even to him who is poor <WH6041> and of a contrite <WH5223> spirit, <WH7307> and who trembles <WH2730> at my word. <WH1697>

He who kills <WH7819> an ox <WH7794> is as he who kills <WH5221> a man; <WH376> he who sacrifices <WH2076> a lamb, <WH7716> as he who breaks <WH6202> a dog <WH3611>'s neck; <WH6202> he who offers <WH5927> an offering, <WH4503> as he who offers pig <WH2386>'s blood; <WH1818> he who burns <WH2142> frankincense, <WH3828> as he who blesses <WH1288> an idol. <WH205> Yes, <WH977> they have chosen their own ways, <WH1870> and their soul <WH5315> delights <WH2654> in their abominations: <WH8251>

I also will choose <WH977> their delusions, <WH8586> and will bring <WH935> their fears <WH4035> on them; <WH7121> because when I called, no one answered; <WH1696> when I spoke, <WH1696> they didn't <WH8085> listen; but they did <WH6213> that which was evil <WH7451> in my eyes, <WH5869> and chose <WH977> that in which I didn't <WH2654> delight."

Hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh, <WH3068> you who tremble <WH2730> at his word: <WH1697> "Your brothers <WH251> who hate <WH8130> you, <WH5077> who cast you out for my name <WH8034>'s sake, <WH559> have said, <WH3068> 'Let Yahweh be glorified, <WH3513> that we may see <WH7200> your joy; <WH8057>' but it is those who shall be disappointed. <WH954>

A voice <WH6963> of tumult <WH7588> from the city, <WH5892> a voice <WH6963> from the temple, <WH1964> a voice <WH6963> of Yahweh <WH3068> that renders <WH7999> recompense <WH1576> to his enemies. <WH341>
"Before she travailed, <WH2342> she brought forth; <WH3205> before her pain <WH2256> came, <WH935> she delivered <WH4422> a son. <WH2145>

Who has heard <WH8085> such a thing? <WH7200> who has seen such things? <WH776> Shall a land be born in one <WH259> day? <WH3117> shall a nation <WH1471> be brought forth <WH2342> at once? <WH6471> for as <WH1571> soon as <WH1571> Zion <WH6726> travailed, <WH2342> she brought forth <WH3205> her children. <WH1121>

Shall I bring to the birth, <WH7665> and not cause to bring forth? <WH3205>" says <WH559> Yahweh: <WH3068> "shall I <WH589> who cause to bring forth <WH3205> shut <WH6113> the womb? <WH559>" says your God. <WH430>
"Rejoice <WH8055> with Jerusalem, <WH3389> and be glad <WH1523> for her, <WH157> all you who love her: <WH7797> rejoice for joy <WH4885> with her, <WH56> all you who mourn over her;

that you may nurse <WH3243> and be satisfied <WH7646> at the comforting <WH8575> breasts; <WH7699> that you may drink deeply, <WH4711> and be delighted <WH6026> with the abundance <WH2123> of her glory. <WH3519>"

For thus says <WH559> Yahweh, <WH3068> "Behold, <WH5186> I will extend peace <WH7965> to her like a river, <WH5104> and the glory <WH3519> of the nations <WH1471> like an overflowing <WH7857> stream: <WH5158> and you will nurse. <WH3243> You will be carried <WH5375> on her side, <WH6654> and will be dandled <WH8173> on her knees. <WH1290>
As one <WH376> whom his mother <WH517> comforts, <WH5162> so will I comfort <WH5162> you; <WH5162> and you will be comforted in Jerusalem. <WH3389>"

You will see <WH7200> it, <WH3820> and your heart shall rejoice, <WH7797> and your bones <WH6106> shall flourish <WH6524> like the tender grass: <WH1877> and the hand <WH3027> of Yahweh <WH3068> shall be known <WH3045> toward his servants; <WH5650> and he will have indignation <WH2194> against his enemies. <WH341>

For, <WH3068> behold, Yahweh will come <WH935> with fire, <WH784> and his chariots <WH4818> shall be like the whirlwind; <WH5492> to render <WH7725> his anger <WH639> with fierceness, <WH2534> and his rebuke <WH1606> with flames <WH3851> of fire. <WH784>
For by fire <WH784> will Yahweh <WH3068> execute judgment, <WH8199> and by his sword, <WH2719> on all flesh; <WH1320> and the slain <WH2491> of Yahweh <WH3068> shall be many. <WH7231>

"Those who sanctify <WH6942> themselves and purify <WH2891> themselves to go to the gardens, <WH1593> behind <WH310> one <WH259> in the midst, <WH8432> eating <WH398> pig <WH2386>'s flesh, <WH1320> and the abomination, <WH8263> and the mouse, <WH5909> they shall come to an end <WH5486> together, <WH3162>" says <WH5002> Yahweh. <WH3068>

"For I know their works <WH4639> and their thoughts: <WH4284> the time comes, <WH935> that I will gather <WH6908> all nations <WH1471> and languages; <WH3956> and they shall come, <WH935> and shall see <WH7200> my glory. <WH3519>

"I will set <WH7760> a sign <WH226> among them, <WH7971> and I will send such as escape <WH6412> of them to the nations, <WH1471> to Tarshish, <WH8659> Pul, <WH6322> and Lud, <WH3865> who draw <WH4900> the bow, <WH7198> to Tubal <WH8422> and Javan, <WH3120> to the islands <WH339> afar off, <WH7350> who have not heard <WH8085> my fame, <WH8088> neither have seen <WH7200> my glory; <WH3519> and they shall declare <WH5046> my glory <WH3519> among the nations. <WH1471>

They shall bring <WH935> all your brothers <WH251> out of all the nations <WH1471> for an offering <WH4503> to Yahweh, <WH3068> on horses, <WH5483> and in chariots, <WH7393> and in litters, <WH6632> and on mules, <WH6505> and on dromedaries, <WH3753> to my holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022> Jerusalem, <WH3389> says <WH559> Yahweh, <WH3068> as the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> bring <WH935> their offering <WH4503> in a clean <WH2889> vessel <WH3627> into the house <WH1004> of Yahweh. <WH3068>
Of them also will I take <WH3947> for priests <WH3548> and for Levites, <WH3881>" says <WH559> Yahweh. <WH3068>

"For as the new <WH2319> heavens <WH8064> and the new <WH2319> earth, <WH776> which I will make, <WH6213> shall remain <WH5975> before <WH6440> me, <WH5002>" says Yahweh, <WH3068> "so your seed <WH2233> and your name <WH8034> shall remain. <WH5975>

It shall happen, <WH1767> that from one new moon <WH2320> to another, <WH2320> and from <WH1767> one Sabbath <WH7676> to another, <WH7676> shall all flesh <WH1320> come <WH935> to worship <WH7812> before <WH6440> me, <WH559>" says Yahweh. <WH3068>

"They shall go forth, <WH3318> and look <WH7200> on the dead bodies <WH6297> of the men <WH582> who have transgressed <WH6586> against me: <WH8438> for their worm shall not die, <WH4191> neither shall their fire <WH784> be quenched; <WH3518> and they will be loathsome <WH1860> to all mankind. <WH1320>"
